alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:02AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Oglala Lakota, northwestern Jackson and southeastern Pennington Counties through 1230 AM MDT... At 1202 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Delta 1 Launch Facility to 11 miles northwest of Potato Creek. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cactus Flat, Cottonwood, Delta 1 Launch Facility and Minuteman Missile Visitors Center around 1210 AM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 121 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains
